name: Tuning (Skill)
text: Can be used when your Life Points decrease by 1000. Instead of conducting your normal draw, draw 1 "Synchron" Tuner Monster of your choice from your Deck. Then, send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. If you began the Duel with 3 or more "Junk" Effect Monsters in your Deck, add "Speed Warrior" from outside of your Deck to your Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
